siteMetadata.title: Just another fancy blog.
siteMetadata.subtitle: The beginning is never easy. But we can get used to the difficulties and add a baggage of experience along the way.

frontmatter.title: Task runner that resolves missing pipeline events
frontmatter.description: When creating pipelines for releasing things to the environment, we may run into the problem of handling too few events. By searching the internet, we can find a quite interesting task runner library that will help us in missing pipelines events
